uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

sequence_no.description: The unique ID of the ACL Rule. sequence_no is auto_generated for acl_type AT_CONNECTION_RATE_FILTER . It can be either manually set for acl_type AT_STANDARD_IPV4 and AT_EXTENDED_IPV4 or auto-generated..

acl_id.description: The ACL ID used to reference it.

traffic_match.description: Filter that defines when the ACL is applied. It is not applicable for acl_type - AT_STANDARD_IPV4  It is mandatory for acl_type - AT_EXTENDED_IPV4

std_source_address.description: Standard ACL source ip address. It is mandatory for acl_type - AT_STANDARD_IPV4  It is not applicable for acl_type - AT_EXTENDED_IPV4
